negativeEvents.name: Car Accident
negativeEvents.text: You have gotten into a car accident, that has left your car completely damaged! How will you handle this terrible situation?

negativeEvents.name: Medical Emergency
negativeEvents.text: You just found out that your daughter slipped off the road, while driving, and hit a tree. She is in stable condition, but you are now filled with hospital fees. What do you do now?

negativeEvents.name: You're Fired!
negativeEvents.text: You have just been laid off! Hopefully, you have a backup plan for a situation like this.

negativeEvents.name: Parents Can Become Sick Too!
negativeEvents.text: Your mother has been very sick recently. She has been in and out of the hospital all week. Since she does not have any insurance, her bills are extremely expensive. You need to do something.

negativeEvents.name: The Robbery
negativeEvents.text: You have been ROBBED! Your most valuable possessions were taken, did you have everything covered?

positiveEvents.name: Your Bonus Check!
positiveEvents.text: You have just gotten a 10% bonus from work. How will you handle the extra money you have just recieved?

positiveEvents.name: Wedding Bells!
positiveEvents.text: Wedding Bells are RINGING! You have just got married, and now your moving into a new house with the one you love. But shouldn't your new house, and everything in it be insured?

positiveEvents.name: Graduation Day
positiveEvents.text: You just graduated from college, and you now need to figure out your financial plan.

positiveEvents.name: Retirement
positiveEvents.text: You have been working at your job about 10 years now, and you enjoy your job. Your boss asked you if you have a retirement plan. Realizing that you do not have a plan at all, what should you do about this situation?

positiveEvents.name: New Born Baby
positiveEvents.text: You have just witness the birth of your new adorable baby boy! He already bringing you a lot of joy into your life, but what if something happens?
